content: Contact SF.gov | San Francisco Skip to main content English Español 中文 Filipino Menu Services Departments Search Contact SF.gov Get help or report a problem. What to do Emergencies For police, fire, or medical emergency, call 911 Help and information 311 For TTY, call 311, option 7 (or 415-701-2323) Outside of San Francisco, call (415-701-2311) Online Submit a request for help online through SF311. You can also report a problem with something in SF. Go to sf311.org Get help San Francisco City Hall 1 Dr. Carlton B. Goodlett Place San Francisco, CA 94102 Mon to Fri, 8:00 am to 6:00 pm Get directions Last updated August 15, 2023 You must have JavaScript enabled to use this form. Was this page helpful?
